reviews.comment: What a waste of money! I could have done a better job washing my clothes myself.
Convenient and hassle-free, using this laundry service saved me a lot of time and effort.
I specifically requested no fabric softener, but they used it anyway. Terrible attention to detail!
I had to wait hours for my laundry to be ready. It was a huge inconvenience.
Horrible experience, my clothes were not even sorted properly and ended up getting damaged.
Convenient and hassle-free, using this laundry service saved me a lot of time and effort.
I will never use this laundry service again after they lost a pair of my expensive pants.
Never again! They returned my clothes wrinkled and poorly folded.
I'm very happy with the laundry service. My clothes were returned smelling fresh and clean.
